div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1133 Cherronesus (near mod. Sevastopol'), (963?) 1853 Burial: late 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 200-300 AR. Pot hoard Cherronesus: dr. (as BMC 3, most with ΜΟΙΡΙΟΣ, a few with ΑΠΟΛ) Disposition: dispersed Liutsenko, p. 46 (letter from P. Burachkov reports up to 500 coins, all with ΜΟΙΡΙΟΣ) † Bertier de la Garde, ZOOID 26 (1906), pp. 253-4 Imhoof-Blumer, ZfN 1878, pp. 145-6 (this hoard ?)
